page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: Many residents follow active recreations including swimming,squash keep-fit and gardening,the latter being done both for enjoyment and also to help provide fresh produce. To pursue these sports travel into Haverhill is necessary this being the nearest Sports Centre. LEISURE Several different activities are followed,females mainly do knitting crochet,sewing and embroidery. Gardening is a popular pursuit as is reading,watching television, walking and touring. Men enjoy fishing and some play in the village cricket team in matches played on the playingfield on Sundays during the summer.Children have a small play area which has a sand pit,swings among other apparatus. Riding their bicycles and horses is also popular amongst the children.
